text.section: In this section, "installment loan" means a loan or extension of credit made for consideration under § 12-103(a)(3) or (c), Title 12, Subtitle 9, or Title 12, Subtitle 10 of the Commercial Law Article.

Unless the person is licensed by the Commissioner, a person may not:
Engage in the business of making installment loans;
Make more than 5 installment loans a year; or
Engage in the business of a credit services business as defined under Title 14, Subtitle 19 of the Commercial Law Article.
